title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Bitterleave Soup
summary: Chunks of Goat meat, Cow head, dry catfish, stock fish, snail cooked with a cocoyam puree or thickener & creamy.

title: Nsala Soup
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken, catfish, stockfish, Goatmeat cooked utazi leave with yam pureee as thickener.
